Show the analysis that leads to your answers.

features.html: The figure above shows the graph of f ', the derivative of the function f , on the closed interval − 1 ≤ x ≤ 5 . The graph of f ' has horizontal tangent lines at x =1 and x =3. The function f is twice differentiable with f (2)=6.
